title: How can technology be used for the benefit of mankind? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology should only be used for the benefit of mankind in an ethical and moral way. Value added technologies make processes and procedures more efficient and safe for end users, in turn, driving societies to grow and flourish. That said, mankind should not loose its humanity through technology and embrace the natural world as a unique and finite resource that needs to be protected.

We were searching for problems in societies, colleges, hostels, anywhere, so that we can use our technology to solve them. Finally, we searched the Problem ;)  Problem: In Colleges, We have seen many student were not using the dustbin properly. They were too lazy to open the Lid of the Dustbin for throwing the waste, thereby they littered around the Dustbin.  [Source: Dawn] This problem was noticed at public places too.  Solution: We have came up with a solution. The solution was our SMARTBIN. This SmartBin will automatically open for 5 seconds when you come near the SmartBin. When the Bin will be full, it will send the message to the authorized person that “The BIN IS FULL”. The authorized person will come and empty the bin. It has Two LED's: Green and Red. Green: Everything is Normal. Red: The Bin is Full.  A Glimpse of our SmartBin.  [Source: My Camera :)]  Demonstration Video:   Now, you will be eager to know that Who are We?
